02 Nov 2019

Euthanasia Coaster - Roller Coaster designed for the expressed purpose to kill.

Euthanasia Coaster

The Euthanasia Coaster is a hypothetical steel roller coaster designed to kill its passengers.[1] In 2010, it was designed and made into a scale model by Lithuanian artist Julijonas Urbonas, a PhD candidate at the Royal College of Art in London. Urbonas, who has worked at an amusement park, stated that the goal of his concept roller coaster is to take lives "with elegance and euphoria".

Quote from the article

“After a sharp right-hand turn the train would enter a straight, where unloading of corpses and loading of new passengers could take place.”

Article discovered and uploaded by Mike K. on 11/02/19
